org.apache.flink.graph.library

类 CommunityDetection<K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.graph.library.CommunityDetection<K>
  • 类型参数:
    K - the Vertex ID type
    所有已实现的接口:
    GraphAlgorithm<K,java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double,Graph<K,java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double>>

    public class CommunityDetection<K>
extends java.lang.Object
implements GraphAlgorithm<K,java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double,Graph<K,java.lang.Long,java.lang.Double>>
    Community Detection Algorithm.

    The Vertex values of the input Graph provide the initial label assignments.

    Initially, each vertex is assigned a tuple formed of its own initial value along with a score equal to 1.0. The vertices propagate their labels and max scores in iterations, each time adopting the label with the highest score from the list of received messages. The chosen label is afterwards re-scored using the fraction delta/the superstep number. Delta is passed as a parameter and has 0.5 as a default value.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • CommunityDetection

        public CommunityDetection(int maxIterations,
                          double delta)
        Creates a new Community Detection algorithm instance. The algorithm converges when vertices no longer update their value or when the maximum number of iterations is reached.
        参数:
        maxIterations - The maximum number of iterations to run.
        delta - The hop attenuation parameter. Its default value is 0.5.
        另请参阅:
        Towards real-time community detection in large networks
